title: Pizza Delicious
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Rotating menu but always with vegan/easily veganizable pizza, pasta and salad options. Vegan garlic spinach pizza on menu. Will make any pizza with Daiya cheese, rotating topping options including peppadews, spicy marinated kale, arugula, caramelized onion, and the standards. Try the vegan campanelle - roasted peppers, tomatoes, kale, caramelized onions and the local early summer salad - green and yellow beans, green tomato, cucumber, turnip, fennel, herbs, cauliflower dill puree. Sometimes offers vegan desserts.
